TopicTitle: Can't find Active Texture Management plugin

Articles.Content: Hey, I need to get the Active Texture Management plugin to assist in keep my KSP going. But, I can't seem to locate it! Help!
This what your are looking for http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/59005
Thanks, that IS what I was searching for!
But, how did you not find it is what I want to know. I'm not gonna do anything snarky like link you a lmgtfy but I'm still curious as to what you did and why it didn't help you in finding it.

But, how did you not find it is what I want to know. I'm not gonna do anything snarky like link you a lmgtfy but I'm still curious as to what you did and why it didn't help you in finding it.

Saw this last night but didn't have the brain power to try to piece together what you were asking...

pretty much, I went to the search box and typed: "Active Texture Management". Unfortunately, it only brought up links that either had nothing to do with it, or the links they provided were so old, they no longer worked. Also, the links I knew were not it as I knew there was a newer thread for this, but could not locate it.

(just so you know, I was needing a more aggressive version of the plugin than I had so that I could run more mods alongside Real Solar System mod without crashing every few minutes)

Yeah, the search isn't really good in my opinion.

Next time, try google searching it.
The search works fine if you set it to "Search Titles Only" instead of "Search Entire Posts".
